plot: At the beginning of XVI century, two spanish ships are wrecked by a storm in the sea, near the coast of America. The few survivors include some prostitutes, a couple of priest and part of the crew. Most of them will die murdered, suicided, killed by animals or natural disaster. At the end only few of them will settled in the old city of Tulum where they will find a place to live isolated away from spanish crown.   Written by  Anonymous
title: El jardín de tía Isabel
